00045 #include <stdio.h>
00046 #include "midas.h"
00047 #include "mevb.h"
00048 #include "ybos.h"
00049 
00050 #include "mucap_compress.h"
00051 
00052 #define NUMCRATES 5
00053 
00054 INT eb_begin_of_run(INT, char *, char *);
00055 INT eb_end_of_run(INT, char *);
00056 INT ebuser(INT, EBUILDER_CHANNEL *, EVENT_HEADER *, void *, INT *);

00061 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00072 INT eb_begin_of_run(INT rn, char * UserField, char * error)
00073 {
00074   extern EBUILDER_SETTINGS ebset;
00075   extern EBUILDER_CHANNEL  ebch[MAX_CHANNELS];
00076   extern HNDLE hDB;
00077 
00078   int n;
00079   int mask = 0;
00080 
00081   char keyName[256];
00082   BOOL enabled;
00083   int size;
00084 
00085   /* 
00086    * Determine which crates are enabled and set up the mask 
00087    * accordingly.
00088    */
00089   for(n = 1; n <= NUMCRATES; n++) {
00090     sprintf(keyName, "/Equipment/Crate %d/Settings/Enabled", n);
00091     size = sizeof(enabled);
00092     db_get_value(hDB, 0, keyName, &enabled, &size, TID_BOOL, FALSE);
00093     if(size == sizeof(enabled) && enabled) {
00094        ebch[n-1].trigger_mask = (1 << (n-1));
00095        mask |= ebch[n-1].trigger_mask;
00096     } else {
00097        ebch[n-1].trigger_mask = 0;
00098     }
00099   }
00100 
00101   cm_msg(MINFO, "eb_begin_of_run", "Setting event mask to 0x%x", mask);
00102   ebset.trigger_mask = mask;
00103  
00104   // Initialize online compression
00105   compress_load_all();
00106   
00107   return EB_SUCCESS;
00108 }
00109 
00110 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00121 INT eb_end_of_run(INT rn, char * error)
00122 {
00123   return EB_SUCCESS;
00124 }
00125 
00126 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00187 INT eb_user(INT nfrag
00188     , EBUILDER_CHANNEL * ebch, EVENT_HEADER *pheader
00189     , void *pevent, INT * dest_size)
00190 {
00191   // Initialize output event
00192   bk_init32(pevent);
00193 
00194   // Loop over the event fragments, performing compression into the output event
00195   for(int i = 0; i < nfrag; i++) {
00196     void *fragment =  ebch[i].pfragment;
00197 
00198     if(fragment != NULL) {
00199       compress_event(((EVENT_HEADER *) fragment) + 1, pevent);
00200       pheader->serial_number = 
00201         ((EVENT_HEADER *) ebch[i].pfragment)->serial_number;
00202     }
00203   }
00204 
00205   // Set the size of the output event properly
00206   pheader->data_size = *dest_size = bk_size(pevent);
00207 
00208   printf("Returning size %d\n", pheader->data_size);
00209 
00210   return EB_SUCCESS;
00211 }
